name: Venezuela Crisis
description: The structural integrity of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela underwent a fundamental and violent transformation in the early hours of January 3, 2026. The execution of a large-scale United States military operation, culminating in the capture and extraction of President Nicolás Maduro and First Lady Cilia Flores, represents the most significant shift in South American geopolitics since the end of the Cold War.
author: thamil
